bibl.title: [Michigan Papyri. Volume XVI.] P. Michigan XVI. A Greek Love Charm from Egypt (P. Mich. 757). (American Studies in Papyrology. 30.)
bibl.note: P. Mich. XVI, 757 (= Inv. 6925). Provenance unknown, 3rd/4th cent. A.D. [= Suppl. Mag. I, 48].
bibl.seg: MARTINEZ David Grey (Edition and Commentary by), [Michigan Papyri. Volume XVI.] P. Michigan XVI. A Greek Love Charm from Egypt (P. Mich. 757). (American Studies in Papyrology. 30.)
Atlanta, Georgia, Scholars Press, 1991, 8°, xiii-161 pp., 6 figg. et 1 pl. dépl. ISBN 1-55540-547-9. $ 44.95.
